Description: Green glazed composition shabti of the God's Father of Amun, Bakkhons, with purple detail: a lappet-wig tied with a fillet, a modelled face and crossed arms holding two hoes; the leg section bears Hieroglyphic text; seed-basket at the back.
Curator's comments: The collection contains four other shabtis of the same man (EA 50106, 50107, 71154 and 71156). The collection also includes four shabtis in a different style of a God's Father of Amun, Bakenkhons, but probably this is a different individual (EA 54839, 68605, 68606 and 71104).
